tool_description:
The Cashboard REST API allows you to connect to our service and manage: Time tracking, Expense tracking, Invoicing, Project proposals / estimates, Invoicing, Project management, Contacts, and Payments.

Our RESTful API returns JSON, JSONP, and XML.
name: Cashboard
title: Cashboard

api_list.name: Account
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cashboard.p.rapidapi.com/account"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cashboard.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: New Account Info
api_list.description: Returns the fields necessary to create a new account
